TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ReplicationOperation extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The ReplicationOperation class represents an Active Directory Domain Services replication operation.
Contains the operation number of this replication operation.
Docs.value: An integer that contains the operation number of this replication operation.
Docs.returns: An integer that contains the operation number of this replication operation.

Docs.summary: Contains the type of replication operation that this operation represents.
Docs.value: One of the members that indicates the type of replication operation that this operation represents.
Docs.returns: One of the members that indicates the type of replication operation that this operation represents.

Docs.summary: Contains the distinguished name of the partition that is associated with this replication operation.
Docs.value: A string that contains the distinguished name of the partition that is associated with this replication operation.
Docs.returns: A string that contains the distinguished name of the partition that is associated with this replication operation.

Docs.summary: Contains the priority of this replication operation.
Docs.value: An integer that contains the priority of this replication operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Tasks with a higher priority value are executed first. The priority is calculated by the server based on the type of operation and its parameters.

Docs.returns: An integer that contains the priority of this replication operation.

Docs.summary: Contains the DNS name of the source server for this replication operation.
Docs.value: A string that contains the DNS name of the source server for this replication operation.
Docs.returns: A string that contains the DNS name of the source server for this replication operation.

Docs.summary: Contains the time that this replication operation was added to the operation queue.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.DateTime> object that contains the date and time that this replication operation was added to the operation queue.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.DateTime> object that contains the date and time that this replication operation was added to the operation queue.
